name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】AZKi SOLO LiVE 2025 ＂Departure＂【ぴあアリーナMM】 [7UlZnyO79Xg]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow of handwritten fan messages and illustrations dedicated to AZKi for her 'Departure' solo live.
An 'Attention' screen displaying concert etiquette rules regarding lighting and cheering.
An announcement screen about the second round of live goods sales starting after the performance.
The slideshow of fan messages continues.

subtitles.original:
Attention ご来場のお客様へ
開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english:
Attention: To our guests.
The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original:
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
声出し応援OKです
subtitles.english:
Please be aware of flashing lights due to production.
Cheering loudly is OK.

subtitles.original:
ライブグッズ 2次販売決定!!
11.19 公演終了後〜
subtitles.english:
Live Goods 2nd Sale Decided!!
Starting 11.19 after the performance finishes.
